features.name: Shift Overview
features.description: Display an overview of all scheduled shifts on the home page and the shifts management page.

tasks.title: Implement ShiftList Component
tasks.description: Develop the ShiftList component to display a list of shifts with key details (employee, start/end time, location).
tasks.technicalNotes: Use TypeScript and Tailwind CSS. Fetch data from /api/shifts using Next.js route handlers. Ensure responsive design and accessibility.

tasks.title: Integrate ShiftList on Home and Shifts Pages
tasks.description: Render the ShiftList component on the home page (app/page.tsx) and shifts management page (app/shifts/page.tsx).
tasks.technicalNotes: Pass fetched shift data as props or fetch within the component using React hooks. Use shadcn/ui for consistent UI elements.

features.name: Shift Creation
features.description: Allow users to create new shifts via a dedicated form.

tasks.title: Develop ShiftForm Component
tasks.description: Create a reusable form component for entering shift details (employee, start/end time, location).
tasks.technicalNotes: Use controlled components with useState/useReducer. Validate required fields. Style with Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui form elements.

tasks.title: Build Shift Creation Page
tasks.description: Implement the /shifts/create page to render the ShiftForm for creating new shifts.
tasks.technicalNotes: On submit, POST data to /api/shifts. Show success/error feedback. Redirect to /shifts on success.

features.name: Shift Management (Edit/Delete)
features.description: Enable editing and deleting of existing shifts.

tasks.title: Edit Shift Functionality
tasks.description: Allow users to edit shift details via ShiftForm on a dedicated page (e.g., /shifts/[id]).
tasks.technicalNotes: Fetch shift data from /api/shifts/[id] for pre-filling the form. On submit, send PUT request to /api/shifts/[id].

tasks.title: Delete Shift Functionality
tasks.description: Enable users to delete a shift from the shift list.
tasks.technicalNotes: Add a delete button in ShiftList. On click, send DELETE request to /api/shifts/[id]. Update UI optimistically using local state.

features.name: API Endpoints for Shifts
features.description: Implement RESTful API endpoints for managing shift data.

tasks.title: Create /api/shifts Route Handler
tasks.description: Handle GET (list all shifts) and POST (create new shift) requests.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use Next.js app/api route handlers. Store data in an in-memory array for the session. Validate input on POST.

tasks.title: Create /api/shifts/[id] Route Handler
tasks.description: Handle GET (fetch shift), PUT (update shift), and DELETE (remove shift) requests.
tasks.technicalNotes: Implement CRUD logic using in-memory store. Ensure proper error handling for missing/invalid IDs.

features.name: State Management
features.description: Manage local UI and data state efficiently using React hooks.

tasks.title: Implement useState/useReducer for Local State
tasks.description: Use React's useState and useReducer hooks to manage form, list, and feedback states.
tasks.technicalNotes: Avoid global state libraries for simplicity. Ensure state updates are efficient and predictable.

features.name: Styling and UI Consistency
features.description: Apply consistent styling and UI components across the application.

tasks.title: Integrate Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui
tasks.description: Ensure all pages and components use Tailwind CSS for layout and shadcn/ui for UI elements.
tasks.technicalNotes: Follow design best practices for accessibility and responsiveness. Use utility classes for rapid development.

features.name: In-Memory Data Layer
features.description: Store and manage shift data in memory for the duration of the session.

tasks.title: Implement In-Memory Store Logic
tasks.description: Maintain an in-memory array/object to store shift entities within API route handlers.
tasks.technicalNotes: Data will be lost on server restart. Suitable for MVP/demo purposes. Consider singleton pattern to persist across requests.

features.name: Routing and Layout
features.description: Set up application routes and layouts using Next.js App Router.

tasks.title: Configure App Router and Layouts
tasks.description: Set up file-based routing for all specified pages and ensure consistent layout with app/layout.tsx.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use Next.js 14 App Router conventions. Ensure navigation between pages is smooth and state is preserved where necessary.

features.name: Validation and Error Handling
features.description: Provide robust validation and user feedback for all forms and API interactions.

tasks.title: Implement Form Validation
tasks.description: Validate required fields and input formats in ShiftForm.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use client-side validation with TypeScript types. Display inline error messages using shadcn/ui components.

tasks.title: API Error Handling
tasks.description: Return appropriate HTTP status codes and error messages from API endpoints.
tasks.technicalNotes: Handle missing fields, invalid IDs, and server errors gracefully.
